page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES,COTEHILL
page.content: { Bulldog.}In Bulldog a few people are it and you have two walls and the people who are it stand in between the walls. The rest stand at one wall and when the people who are it say"Now!" you run between the walls. The people who are it have to lift you up and shout"Bulldog!" Then you are it. You keep on playing until every one is caught then the people who were caught first are it and a new game starts. {Stick in the mud.}In stick in the mud 1 to 5 people are it and they count to 10 in seconds, while every one else runs away. When some one is caught they stand where they were caught. To free them you have to crawl under neath their legs. The few people that are first caught are it at a new game.
